short_summary: Supply temporary live steam generation to feed into the existing de-icing pipe at Rideau Falls East and West Dams in Ottawa.
description: Amendment 002 to extend closing date to July 5, 2023 at 2:00PM DST. AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by June 28, 2023 at 2:00pm DST. All bids submitted after 2:00pm DST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada seeks to be supplied with temporary live steam generation to feed into the existing de-icing pipe at Rideau Falls East and West Dams in Ottawa. It is recommended that the Bidder or a representative of the Bidder visit the work site. Arrangements have been made for the site visit to be held at Rideau Falls (West side) at National Research Council of Canada 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario on Thursday June 1st 2023. The site visit will begin at 10:00 EDT, outside at Rideau Falls (West side). Personnel security screening is required prior to gaining authorized access to PROTECTED information, assets or sites. The Bidder’s Company Security Officer (CSO) must ensure that their representative(s) hold a valid security clearance at the required level for the site visit. Failure to comply with the security requirements will result in the representative(s) being denied access to the site.
duration_in_months: The Contract duration is expected to be approximately 7 months.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Project Title:** Temporary Steam Boiler for Rideau Falls

**Reference Number:** WS4005038676-Doc4005104600

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Solicitation Number:** WS4005038676

**Publication Date:** 15 May 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** 05 July 2023 at 2:00 PM (Daylight Saving Time)

**Amendment Date:** 27 June 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 01 September 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** 30 April 2025

**Note:** This tender is now closed due to expiration on the tender closing date.

**Preload Open Bidding Method:** Competitive open bidding will be used to select a vendor for this project.

**Evaluation Criteria:** Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Trade Agreements:** This project is subject to the following trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canadian trade agreements with Chile, Honduras, Korea, Mexico, and Turkey.

**Contracting Entity:** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) will be managing this project.

**Site Visit Information:** The bidding vendors are strongly advised to visit the project site to gain a deeper understanding of the project's requirements. The site visit will be held on 01 June 2023 at 100 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario. Attendance at the site visit is mandatory for all bidders.

**Tender Description:** The Project Manager seeks to obtain a temporary steam generation system to feed into the Rideau Falls de-icing pipe in Ottawa, Canada. The successful bidder must provide a system that generates live steam. All bidders must be compliant with the personnel security screening requirements for the project site. Submissions must be made electronically via the Discovery platform. For any inquiries about this project, please contact Pierre Lavigne, PSPC, via email pierre.lavigne@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Source:** [Click here to access the tender details](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16279843?extsite=MTYyNzk4NDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
